data.prayer: Father, please provide access to your Word for everyone, especially believers in Belombre, Seychelles.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Belombre, Seychelles
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Belombre, Seychelles need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 14 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Belombre, Seychelles.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Belombre.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 285 believers in Belombre against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Belombre, Seychelles to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the state of Belombre, Seychelles has a population of 4,100.

We estimate Belombre has 285 people who might know Jesus, 3,658 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 156 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Belombre, Seychelles that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
